default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I can work for you, but let me be clear: I don't do overtime. My efforts should be reasonably scheduled. However, if the MBCC can promise me quadruple hourly pay, I might reluctantly consider it.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: We have achieved milestones in our work.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: All evils... will be exterminated by this lightsaber!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The new model is more efficient now.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I won't let any of this unsightly trash escape.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Hah! Even the air feels fresher now!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Next time, I'll slash you all to pieces!

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: My work stress comes almost entirely from the people I meet at work, not the work itself.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Still working overtime? Go do something more meaningful, like reading a book. DisCity Labor Law is a good one. I presented it at the Nirvana book club once. You should really give it a read.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Of course, I'll protest against unfair treatment and challenge incorrect propositions. Anything wrong should be corrected. I mean, how else will we make any progress in this world?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: There are many ways to relieve stress. I relieve mine by playing racquetball. I'd imagine the ball as all the things that annoy me and just smash it with the racket. I can spend an entire evening doing that. I'll send you the address if you're interested.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: My first boss was a useless freeloader, so I threw him to the dump. My second boss was competent, but I wondered if her intelligence was her only gift. As for you... You don't act like a typical superior, but you're probably the best boss I've ever had.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Doesn't every kid dream of becoming a hero in the novels? But we can't all be the chosen one who has the power to defeat evil. In reality, you either conform or get consumed. But I refuse to let them change me, so I choose to change them instead.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Working for you is really easy for me. I'm not saying the work here is simple, what I mean is... my mind can get a break here. I'm no longer chased by overwhelming pressure. An ideal world is forming gradually around you. Though it's just a rough model now... I can see its completed form in the future.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Is this today's request? Got it. I'll submit a report before I clock out.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Work-life balance? Good point. Time to take five and grab a Dispresso.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Bother me again and I'll chop down on your face.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Request received.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Work's done. I'm off.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Get to the point. Don't ruin my plan of getting off on time.

nebula_sentinel.title: Level Up
nebula_sentinel.text: This radiant glow grows ever brighter because of you.

nebula_sentinel.title: Pat Head
nebula_sentinel.text: Do you sense it too? The mysterious force that exists between all things. A vast and omnipresent energy. Heroes use it to uphold justice, while villains bend it to their will for their own purposes... It dwells within all of us.

nebula_sentinel.title: Obtain Attire
nebula_sentinel.text: Across thousands of galaxies and tens of thousands of planets, my lightsaber has guided me here. Throughout this long journey, you are the only one that I have been drawn to by destiny's pull. I ask of you, are you my companion?

nebula_sentinel.title: Greeting
nebula_sentinel.text: May the light of justice be with you.

nebula_sentinel.title: Ordinary Contact 1
nebula_sentinel.text: I've traveled through the universe, witnessing brilliant worlds consumed by darkness and tyrannical hells overthrown and shattered. No matter what, I swear never to stand idle as justice and light fade away.

nebula_sentinel.title: Ordinary Contact 2
nebula_sentinel.text: The chosen one who will defeat all evil? Surely you don't believe in that so-called prophecy, do you? Personally, I believe that if everyone could act with integrity, the world wouldn't fall into darkness and chaos, and we wouldn't need a messiah at all.

nebula_sentinel.title: Ordinary Contact 4
nebula_sentinel.text: Do not falter before the darkness. As long as we fight side by side, we will surely cleanse and vanquish these evils. I believe light and hope will ultimately triumph through our hands.

nebula_sentinel.title: Idle
nebula_sentinel.text: This radiant sky of iridescent stars is truly captivating, but I believe the shining virtues residing in people's hearts are equally worthy of our reverence.

nebula_sentinel.title: Special Attention
nebula_sentinel.text: We will always walk together on the path of justice. You are never alone.
